text_block_list.text: Running is my way of praying…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
Hah… hah… haa. 
Egh… gekh.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: I'm struggling to breathe. That I know. When that happens, I should… take deep breaths.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: Pollux, a gently twinkling red star. It is one of the twenty-one first-magnitude stars which makes up the Winter Hexagon.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: I'm sure you're looking up at it too tonight… over there…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: I have to go…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: I pray. Instead of clasping my hands together, I pray by kicking at the earth below me. I pray that the brilliant and wonderful things present at the end of this path that I follow…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: will someday reach you…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
The "Selection Race" would soon be upon us, a race where 
trainers can assess the abilities of up-and-coming Uma Musume.

When I arrived at the racecourse I noticed numerous other 
trainers there looking to observe the Uma Musume there today.
Woah! Her ability in the final stretch is amazing!
text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
She's also quite adept at determining when she needs to spurt in 
the final stretch. Admire Vega, as I watch your race I only grow 
more and more excited about you.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
I heard the name of one of the racers that I had been 
interested in, so I hastily looked over towards the race course.
Thank you for running with me!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Thank you as well. 
Are you done…?
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
Y-Yes, I have a dinner arrangement with Urara-san 
and her friends. Umm, err, well… if you 
want, you can come too, Ayabe-san.
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: No. I'm going to… run a bit longer.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: Ah! Umm… Please don't push yourself too hard…!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Hah, haa, haaa―!
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
As more and more of the girls finished up their training, she 
continues to train stoically and alone, indifferently rejecting 
the invitations of her friends.
Haaaah…!!
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
I could sense the talent that her legs 
possessed and it sent a shiver down my spine.

Admire Vega: an Uma Musume with 
amazing ability and incredible potential…
choice_data_list: What kind of Uma Musume is she?
What kind of Uma Musume is she?

text_block_list.text:
Afterwards, I went back to my office and began doing research on 
Admire Vega. I was so absorbed in my research that before I knew 
it it was the dead of night.

Guess it's time I headed back to the trainer's dormitories. As I 
stepped outside I noticed something…
choice_data_list:
<size=37>Hmm? A shadowy figure 
on the racecourse?</size>

text_block_list.text:
―Feeh. 
…Haa, haah…!
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
Alone, she continued to train at the racecourse. 
As one might expect, she looked completely exhausted.
I can't… give up… now…!
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
Without slowing her pace she 
continued to move her legs. It was like…
Haah haaah… Ugh…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
All of a sudden she stopped, looking completely exhausted. In the 
silence, where the echoes of her footsteps finally stopped she 
stood there, her eyes filled with the reflection of the stars.

The stars. Not only the stars, but the sky filled with said 
stars… As if overwhelmed by the sheer beauty of what she saw, 
she stood there entranced…
Eh?
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: Even I was unsure why I responded in that manner…
I'm fine… I do this all of the time.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: Usually.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: No. This is necessary for me to win…
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text: I win. I run, then win more. That is all.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
If you'd like to discuss being my trainer, 
wait until after the Selection Race. Bye.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
At that moment, the lights used for night training 
suddenly went out. Drowned in the starlight, as 
if melting into the night, she walked away.

As if driving herself into the ground, the great resolve 
that Admire Vega carried would stay with me forever.
